snippet: Washington is the second state after Colorado to allow legal sales of marijuana, though few stores have completed licensing requirements and will have limited supplies.
abstract: Washington State's experiment with licensed, legal recreational marijuana begins in handful of locations around state, albeit with limited supplies as licensed growers wait for first full crop to be harvested and certified to be Washington-grown; Washington State Liquor Control Board has issued 25 retail licenses but some media reports indicate that as few as four shops are open and ready for business.
lead_paragraph: Washington is the second state after Colorado to allow legal sales of marijuana, though few stores have completed licensing requirements and will have limited supplies.

headline.main: Sales of Recreational Marijuana Begin in Washington State
headline.print_headline: Sales of Recreational Marijuana Begin in Washington State
